Title: Requires single-use beverage containers to be manufactured with seventy-five percent recycled materials
Summary: Requires single-use beverage containers to be manufactured with seventy-five percent recycled materials for sale in the state.
LawCode: Amd ยง27-1011, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to requiring single-use beverage containers to be manufactured with seventy-five percent recycled materials
